actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research

official_title: To provide relief to mobilized military reservists from certain Federal agricultural loan obligations.
short_title: Active Reservists and National Guard Farm Loan Relief Act of 2003

summary.text: Active Reservists and National Guard Farm Loan Relief Act of 2003 - Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to provide for loan interest forgiveness while a borrower is a mobilized active reservist and principal payment deferral while (or after) a borrower is a mobilized active reservist. Defines "mobilized military reservist."

titles.title: Active Reservists and National Guard Farm Loan Relief Act of 2003
To provide relief to mobilized military reservists from certain Federal agricultural loan obligations.
